amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary to allocate $1 million to study the human health effects of left-over munitions in congested residential areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide the amount otherwise made available by "Operation and Maintenance-Environmental Restoration, Formerly Used Defense Sites" is reduced and increased by 1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Norton.
